remarks: Multiplication of the identity NxN matrix with an N-dimensional vector results in the vector itself.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Feb-2019.) (Revised by AV, 23-Feb-2019.)
statement:
1mavmul.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
1mavmul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
1mavmul.t $e |- .x. = ( R maVecMul <. N , N >. ) $.
1mavmul.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
1mavmul.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
1mavmul.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( B ^m N ) ) $.
1mavmul $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1r ` A ) .x. Y ) = Y ) $.
